LanguageData.Giantism.degreeDatas.0.label: Giantism
LanguageData.Giantism.degreeDatas.0.description: A Giants with giantism is said to grow up to 30 feet. Not only {PAWN_possessive} heights, but {PAWN_possessive} skin grows thicker. To compensate for such growth, {PAWN_nameDef} must eat more.
LanguageData.MonsterHunter.degreeDatas.0.label: Monster Hunter
LanguageData.MonsterHunter.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was titled a great warrior after striking down a dangerous beast single-handedly.
